meanings.definition: The action of restoring someone or something to a previous position or condition.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the reinstatement of power took several days.
meanings.sent2: The reinstatement of the old painting brought back its original beauty.
meanings.sent3: The reinstatement of the lost toy made the child jump with joy.
meanings.sent4: The reinstatement of the fallen tree symbolized renewal in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The reinstatement of the broken vase was a delicate process.

meanings.definition: The act of reinstating someone in a job or position.
meanings.sent1: The company announced the reinstatement of the experienced manager.
meanings.sent2: Her reinstatement as team captain boosted morale among the players.
meanings.sent3: The reinstatement of the clumsy waiter led to some comical mishaps.
meanings.sent4: His reinstatement as lead singer brought new energy to the band.
meanings.sent5: The reinstatement of the retired teacher was met with cheers from students.
